titles.title: To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.
To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This bill specifies requirements for the application of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to general account policies that receive contributions from employee benefit plans. A "general account policy" is an insurance policy or contract to the extent that the policy or contract allocates amounts to the insurer's general account including any surplus in a separate account but excluding any other portion of a separate account.
